channel.title: How can u change the (email not verified)?
channel.description:
In this post by imjohn10 http://moparisthebest.org/smf/index.php/topic,46809.0.html
He tells us that you can get any @Domain.com/net/org/gov/etc.
but I know that you can't check your email if you make a new and fake email his way, and because its like that you cant just click there to verify your email because it says it doesnt exist, but you can still use it on msn messenger. So I was looking through all the things the msn messenger folder has and edited them, and opened them with Source Hacker, but I can't find that stupid thing!!!
Ok, what I'm trying to find something that makes it say (email not verified) so that you can change what it says!!! or to mess up the thing so that it doesnt check if it is verified or not, then it wont say anything.
so someone that is a GREAT coder/hacker/kewl person help me fix it so it doesnt say that!!
cuz then people dont believe me that im from jagex or something!!!!
and other people will thank you for this because it will help us all :) :) ;) ;) :D :D :D and I will put you on my sig sayin (name) is the best coder ever!! omg!!!
PLEASE HELP
EDIT: im not going to scam, I want to just trick my friends and screw around with them...

item.title: How can u change the (email not verified)?
item.dc:creator: @Rictoo Rictoo
item.description:
@Rictoo wrote:

Yeah, to remove that you need to verify the account (ie., login to the email account, and click on the link sent from msn). Since you CAN’T login to a fake email account, forget about it.

Read full topic
item.source: How can u change the (email not verified)?

item.title: How can u change the (email not verified)?
item.dc:creator: @Mr.Chris Mr.Chris
item.description:
@Mr.Chris wrote:

If it’s just a joke, why are you so upset about people knowing you’re not from Jagex? Because you can’t get your free geepees.

Just a note, the (E-mail address not verified) probably can’t be removed.

Read full topic
